cannotUpdateError: Can only be updated before game start.
changeColumnsNumber: Click to change number of word letters.
changeRowsNumber: Click to change number of tries.
guessedLettersNotIncludedError: Hard Mode on: your new guess should use all the guessed letters!
howToPlay1: Guess the word in the predefined number of tries.
howToPlay2: Type a guess and press {0} to submit. Each guess must be a valid word in the chosen language. Note: In had mode, the new guess should include all the letters already guessed.
howToPlay3: After each guess, the color of each letter changes, to show how close to the correct word the guess was. E.g., considering the guess {0} and the solution {1}, the board looks like this:
howToPlay4: Letter {0} exists in the word in this exact position.
howToPlay5: Letter {0} exists in the word but in another position.
howToPlay6: Letters {0} don't exist in the word.
includedLetter: Letter {letter} exists in the word to guess but in another position.
lowLetterNumberError: Only words with {numberOfLetters} letters are valid!
matchedLetter: Letter {letter} exists in the word to guess in this position.
notMatchedLetter: Letter {letter} doesn't exist in the word to guess.
shareError: It was not possible to share!
